FAQ

  • What is a dog ball launcher?

    An automatic ball thrower is a device that launches dog balls, usually tennis-sized, to a distance between 10 and 30 feet. An automatic launcher is a great way to keep your pup physically active and entertained, maintain a special bond between you and your dog, and help your pooch get over your regular long absences from home.

  • Do dog ball launchers require special balls?

    Most dog ball launchers available in the market today work with tennis-sized balls that can be easily replaced with standard tennis balls once the original ones can no longer be used. However, some models use different sizes of balls or specifically prohibit the owners from using anything other than proprietary balls.

  • How does an automatic dog ball thrower work?

    An automatic ball thrower for dogs shoots a ball to a set distance for your pup to fetch. The ball can then be picked up by the dog and dropped in the launcher to be thrown again. This cycle can be repeated for as long as your dog enjoys it or until the batteries need to be recharged. Most launchers can also be powered by AC.

  • How far do automatic dog ball launchers throw balls?

    The standard distance range available in most dog ball thrower models is between 10 and 30 feet. There are also some outdoor models that can throw the ball up to 50 feet. The best launchers allow you to adjust the settings, so that your pup is not able to predict where the ball will land and is constantly alert.
